params._receiveCooldown: The cooldown period for receiving in seconds

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._token: The address of the token to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._receiver: The address that will receive the tokens

params._mintAmount: The amount of tokens to mint

The new receive cooldown period in seconds

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getFaucetTokenBaseAmount(address).notice: Get the base amount for a faucet token

getFaucetTokenBaseAmounts().notice: Get the base amounts for all faucet tokens

getFaucetTokens().notice: Get the list of faucet tokens

getIsFaucetToken(address).notice: Check if a token is a faucet token

getLastMinted(address,address).notice: Get the last mint timestamp for a user and token

getLastReceived(address,address).notice: Get the last receive timestamp for a user and token

getNextMintTimestamp(address,address,add.notice: Get the next mint timestamp for a token

removeFaucetToken(address).notice: Remove a token from the faucet

requestAllTokens(address).notice: Request all tokens from the faucet

requestToken(address,address,uint256).notice: Request a single token from the faucet

setFaucetToken(address,uint256).notice: Set a token as a faucet token with a base amount
